api.name: Get_Hotel_Reviews(Tips)
api.func_description: Retrieve reviews and tips for a specified hotel.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

sort_option_id.description: sort_option_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/getHotelReviewsSortOption(Get Hotel Reviews(Tips) Sort Option) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

result.title: Very pleasant staff, in a calm, relaxing, spotless hôtel
result.pros: Great staff , very quiet, very clean, large room
result.cons: Shower door sticky to use,

I know it’s a bit out of season but it would have been nice if the bar was available and coffee in the rooms would have been welcome. However the lack of these facilities did not spoil our stay in any way. Thank you
result.title: Thank you for a great few days
result.pros: The rooms are beautiful, very clean
Breakfast was delicious and very filling, set us up for a day trip to Barcelina
result.title: Fantastic stay, they had thought about everything. Lovely to have a beautiful outdoor restaurant on
result.cons: Unfortunately there were major roadworks whilst we we staying so very noisy from 8 am

required.query: I'm considering staying at a hotel with ID 5955189 and would like to see what other guests have said about their experiences there. Can you provide me with the reviews?

optional.query: I'm planning to stay at the hotel with ID 5955189 and would like to read the most relevant reviews from the first page. Could you provide them in English?

Pleasant
result.cons: To reach our room, we had to go through really long hall that was extremely dusty, smelly and it looked like a part of a chair factory.
result.pros: The hotel employees were very helpful and kind. It is possible to order breakfast for certain time. Really close to the aeroport.
result.hotelier_response: We’re glad to hear that our staff was helpful and kind, and that you appreciated the convenience of our location near the airport. However, we apologize for the unpleasant experience you had with the hallway, and we truly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We’ll take immediate action to address the cleanliness and maintenance issues to ensure a more comfortable stay for our future guests. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

result.pros: It was all newly renovated and clean.
result.hotelier_response: Thank you for your feedback. We're glad to hear that you found the hotel newly renovated and clean. We apologize for the missing amenities and will certainly take your comments into consideration to enhance our offerings. We aim to provide a more comfortable experience for all our guests, and your input helps us improve. We hope to welcome you again and provide a more complete stay next time.
result.cons: There were no basic things that are usually there in a hotel at this price. No mat outside washroom to wipe the feet there was no dustbin in the entire room anywhere no cupboard . when asked for shower gel shampoo some soaps were given.
result.title: It was overall good
value for money for short transit stays
result.cons: Location may not be to everyone's liking, kinda in a back alley of chandivali. Although there are plenty of street food options around
result.pros: It was clean and comfortable and the staff was super courteous
result.hotelier_response: Thank you for sharing your feedback! We're glad to hear you found the stay clean, comfortable, and enjoyed the courteous staff. We appreciate your comments on the location and will keep that in mind. We're pleased that you had access to street food options nearby. We hope to welcome you again soon!

result.pros: Courteous staff and location.
result.title: Good location for Chandivali-Powai proximity

Thank you for your valuable feedback, and we hope to provide you with an improved stay next time.

result.title: 1 night in Fabhotel Elvis Inn
Pleasant
result.pros: Price friendly.. Economic option to stay in Mumbai..
result.hotelier_response: Thank you for your feedback! We're glad to hear that you found the hotel to be a price-friendly and economical option. We understand the concern about the remote location, and we will take note of this for future improvements. We hope to welcome you again soon!
result.cons: Remote area.. No shops or restaurants nearby..

result.title: Horrible
result.pros: Horrible experience to stay at these hotel..Please avoid for 5 main reasons.. 1)Rooms are very small 2)Lots of mosquitoes in the room… 3) Outside food is strictly not allowed here. And in-house food facility is very costly and tasteless 4)Breakfast is not at all good.. and very less for a single person 5)Guy who was responsible for managing breakfast was very stubborn , he will straight forward deny if you demand your already booked food and unnecessarily argue with you… I will never ever visit this hotel in my life.. This is my worst experience in any hotel in my life.
result.cons: Horrible experience to stay at these hotel..Please avoid for 5 main reasons.. 1)Rooms are very small 2)Lots of mosquitoes in the room… 3) Outside food is strictly not allowed here. And in-house food facility is very costly and tasteless 4)Breakfast is not at all good.. and very less for a single person 5)Guy who was responsible for managing breakfast was very stubborn , he will straight forward deny if you demand your already booked food and unnecessarily argue with you… I will never ever visit this hotel in my life.. This is my worst experience in any hotel in my life.

result.title: An overall a very good property with your needs completed.
result.pros: I have booked this hotel for a short stay last month. The ambience was nice and calm. What I liked was the response from the front desk staff. He was polite and courteous. The check-in process was smooth and quick. The rooms were spacious. The room service was prompt. The bathroom was neat and clean and provided with toiletries. You can check with the hotel prior to booking. I had used book and pay later for booking this hotel. There is a restaurant in this property. The food was good. No issues. It's overall a good property.
result.hotelier_response: We're delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us. It's great to know that you appreciated the calm ambiance, polite staff, and smooth check-in process. We're also happy that you found the rooms spacious, room service prompt, and the bathroom clean with all the necessary toiletries. We truly value your recommendation and are glad you enjoyed the food at our restaurant. We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another great experience!
result.cons: No issues.
Nothing
result.hotelier_response: We’re glad to hear that your stay was up to expectations. We hope to welcome you back for another great experience soon!
result.pros: Performance stay
result.title: Absolutely right

result.pros: It was bit clean and early check inn if available.
result.cons: The room very very noise as the noise of neighbours exhaust fans didn’t let me sleep whole night. In middle of night someone was making scary noise feels like you are sleeping in a prison. I would not go back at any cost.
result.title: Cheap shit better to stay for short terms.

result.hotelier_response: Thank you for your feedback! We're glad you liked the room and staff. Apologies for the inconvenience in reaching the hotel directly. We'll work on ensuring better contact information for a smoother experience. Looking forward to welcoming you again!
result.pros: Great room and staff.
result.cons: Wasn't able to contact hotel staff before checkin to communicate that i was late. The contact number on google is not of reception instead its the fabhotel hotline which was not relevant.
result.title: Exceptional
Fair
result.pros: It's very near to the Airport.
result.hotelier_response: Thank you for sharing your feedback. We're glad you found the location convenient. We understand that room size is an important factor, and we appreciate your input. Your comments will help us improve our offerings.
result.cons: The size of the room is very small.

result.pros: The Stay Of The Hotel Was Lovely Like To Visit Here Again This was my second stay at ELVIS Hotel. There hotel has upgraded and the rooms are in very good condition. The rooms are well maintained and the bed comfortable. All the facilities exceeded my expectation. The food at the restaurant was very good and delicious. The WIFI at the hotel is very good with no problems at all. The staff are very service orientated and go out of their way to assist in all areas. They assisted with booking of taxis and gave good advise to their guests.
result.hotelier_response: We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed your upgraded stay, the comfortable rooms, delicious food, and attentive staff. We look forward to welcoming you again for another fantastic experience!
result.cons: No nothing a pinch.
result.title: Upgradtion moment for me.

result.hotelier_response: We’re so glad you loved your stay. We look forward to welcoming you again for another great experience!
result.pros: Awesome experience Loved to stay here ☺️
result.cons: No
result.title: Exceptional
Absolutely Fantastic shall visit here.
result.hotelier_response: We’re thrilled to hear you had an amazing experience with our location, friendly staff, cleanliness, and the overall ambiance. We truly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you again soon!
result.pros: Our stay at this hotel was absolutely fantastic! The location was perfect, with easy access to transportation and a variety of amenities nearby. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, making us feel welcome from the moment we arrived. The cleanliness of the property was impeccable, and the facilities provided exceeded our expectations. The WiFi was reliable, allowing us to stay connected throughout our stay. Some amazing restaurants nearby as well as the ones inside the hotel. The decorations were beautiful too for Christmas and overall vibe of the hotel was great. The hotel's walkability score was excellent, as we could easily explore the surrounding area on foot. Overall, we had a wonderful experience and would highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay in Mumbai.
result.cons: No to say nothing perfect

result.title: Luxury at affordable price. The rooms were good.

result.pros: Luxury at affordable price. The rooms were good with all necessary accessories.
